Candis Mosely Pettway (November 25, 1924 na May 22, 1997) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe
A na-ejikọta ya na Freedom Quilting Bee na Gee's Bend otu ndị na-eme quilters, n'akụkụ ụmụ ya nwanyị Qunnie Pettway, Sally Mae Pettway na Edwina Pettway.
Candis Mosely lụrụ Tank Pettway ma soro zụlite ụmụ iri na isii
Ruo ógè ụfọdụ, ha lekọtara nwa nwanne ha nwanyị Loretta Pettway
Mgbè ọtụtụ n'ime ụmụ ya tolitere, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ kichin na ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị dị n'ógbè ahụ
Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri ise, ọ malitere inwe nsogbu obi ma ghàrà ịrụ ọrụ
Ọ nwụrụ na 1997 mgbè ọ dị afọ 73.
Mgbè ọ dara ọrịa n'ihi nsogbu obi, Pettway na-achịkọta obéré aṅụ na-ekpuchi n'ụlọ ya ugboro ugboro iji mee akwa nke ọma
Aṅụ ya na-agụnye nwanne nne ya Allie Pettway, Lucy Mingo, na nwa nwanyị Allie, Lola Pettway.
